title: Breaking Addiction - Lance Dodes
description: The follow-up to his groundbreaking volume The Heart of Addiction, Dr. Lance Dodesâ€™s Breaking Addiction is a step-by-step guide to beating addiction of any kindâ€”from drugs and gambling to alcoholism, overeating, and sex addiction. By recognizing and understanding the emotional forces underlying addictive behaviors, Dr. Dodes says any dangerous, life-destroying obsession can be overcome. Including special bonus sections for both families and health-care professionals, Breaking Addiction is the new handbook for those suffering from addictionâ€”a valuable resource that addresses addictionâ€™s root causes and serves as an alternative to Alcoholics Anonymous and similar recovery programs
